00010 #define Apoxi_Ticks_hpp
00013 
00014 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00015 #include <Kernel/Os/TickValue.hpp>
00016 #include <limits.h>
00017 
00019 class Ticks {
00020     public:
00022         Ticks() : m_ticks(0) {}
00023 
00025         Ticks(UINT32 ms) { SetMilliSeconds(ms); }
00026 
00028         Ticks(const Ticks &ticks) : m_ticks(ticks.m_ticks) {}
00029 
00031         explicit Ticks(const TickValue& tick_value) : m_ticks(tick_value.Get()) {}
00032 
00034         void SetEmpty() { m_ticks = 0; }
00035 
00037         BOOLEAN IsEmpty() const { return m_ticks == 0; }
00038 
00040         UINT32 GetExpiredTime() const;
00041 
00043         UINT32 GetExpiredTime(const Ticks &ticks) const { return ticks.m_ticks - m_ticks; }
00044 
00046         Ticks& operator =(const Ticks &ticks) { m_ticks = ticks.m_ticks; return *this; }
00047 
00049         Ticks operator +(const Ticks &ticks) const { 
00050             Ticks sum;
00051             sum.m_ticks = m_ticks + ticks.m_ticks;
00052             return sum;
00053         }
00054 
00056         Ticks& operator +=(const Ticks &ticks) { m_ticks += ticks.m_ticks; return *this; }
00057 
00059         Ticks operator -(const Ticks &ticks) const {
00060             Ticks diff;
00061             diff.m_ticks = m_ticks - ticks.m_ticks;
00062             return diff;
00063         }
00064 
00066         Ticks& operator -=(const Ticks &ticks) { m_ticks -= ticks.m_ticks; return *this; }
00067 
00069         BOOLEAN operator ==(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks == ticks.m_ticks; }
00070 
00072         BOOLEAN operator !=(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks != ticks.m_ticks; }
00073 
00075         BOOLEAN operator >(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks > ticks.m_ticks; }
00076 
00078         BOOLEAN operator <(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks < ticks.m_ticks; }
00079 
00081         BOOLEAN operator >=(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks >= ticks.m_ticks; }
00082 
00084         BOOLEAN operator <=(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks <= ticks.m_ticks; }
00085 
00087         static Ticks Infinite() {
00088             Ticks ticks; 
00089             ticks.m_ticks = ULONG_MAX;
00090             return ticks;
00091         }
00092 
00093     private:
00094         UINT32 m_ticks;
00095 
00096         void SetMilliSeconds(UINT32 time) { m_ticks = time; }
00097 
00098         UINT32 GetMilliSeconds() const { return m_ticks; }
00099 
00100         friend class Timer;
00101         friend class Os;
00102         friend class Semaphore;
00103         friend class SysSocket;
00104 };
